title: Book Summary - Atomic Habits
content: Focus on small, consistent improvements. Habit stacking is key. Make it obvious, attractive, easy, satisfying.

title: Recipe - Pasta Carbonara
content:
Ingredients: Guanciale, eggs, Pecorino Romano, black pepper, pasta.
Steps: Cook guanciale, whisk eggs and cheese, cook pasta, combine.
